mapper.sql: SELECT CODE_CTGR_CD AS codeCtgrCd , CODE_CTGR_NM AS codeCtgrNm , CODE_CTGR_ODR AS codeCtgrOdr , CODE_CTGR_DESC AS codeCtgrDesc , USE_YN as useYn , REG_NO as regNo , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(REG_NO) FROM DUAL) AS regNm , REG_DTTM as regDttm , MOD_NO as modNo , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(MOD_NO) FROM DUAL) AS modNm , MOD_DTTM as modDttm , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SYS_CODE WHERE TB_SYS_CODE_CTGR.CODE_CTGR_CD = CODE_CTGR_CD ) AS subCnt FROM TB_SYS_CODE_CTGR WHERE '1' = '1'

AND CODE_CTGR_NM LIKE '%'||#{codeCtgrNm}||'%' OR UPPER(CODE_CTGR_CD) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{codeCtgrNm})||'%'
ORDER BY CODE_CTGR_NM
